Contributor: Daugherty, James Henry, 1889-1974, artist.; United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation, publisher.;
Note: Signed "James H. Daugherty." Date based on America's participation in the war. Initial "D" with a "P" in it appears. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Illustration shows a large colourful eagle flying over ships and industrial sights. Text says to "send the eagle's answer; more ships."
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Washington, D.C. : United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Send the eagle's answer : more ships
